exceptions.tactic: intros Q a b H p q H0 H1 H2.
apply reduceplus_mults_invf0 with (r := mults multA (invTerm invA) q).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : Term A n H : eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) (ppc A1 (n:=n) a b) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) p, q : list (Term A n) H0 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) Q H1 : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) The term "invTerm invA" has type "forall n : nat, Term A n -> Term A n" while it is expected to have type "Term A ?n".

original: intros Q a b H p q H0 H1 H2. apply reduceplus_mults_invf0 with (r := mults multA (invTerm invA) q).
